chapters.title: Ekalavya’s Aspiration
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a young Nishada, aspires to learn archery from Guru Dronacharya, despite his background.

chapters.title: Creating a Guru Idol
chapters.description: Denied by Drona, Ekalavya creates a clay idol of the guru and trains diligently before it.

chapters.title: Drona’s Encounter
chapters.description: Dronacharya witnesses Ekalavya’s unmatched skills and becomes concerned about the implications.

chapters.title: The Thumb Sacrifice
chapters.description: Ekalavya offers his thumb as Guru Dakshina to Drona, embodying ultimate devotion and sacrifice.
